text: Forbidden Planet is a 1956 American science fiction movie set in the 23rd century. It was written by Cyril Hume, directed by Fred M. Wilcox and produced by Nicholas Nayfack. It stars Walter Pidgeon, Anne Francis and Leslie Nielsen. The storyline is an obvious take of Shakespeare's The Tempest. == Other websites == * Category:1956 movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:English-language movies
title: Forbidden Planet
